content: of work k1bm knit to 1 stitch before marker s1b slip 1 with yarn in back k2bm knit to 2 stitches before marker s2b slip 2 with yarn in back k2tog knit two stitches together s1f slip 1 with yarn in front k3tog knit three stitches together s2f slip 2 with yarn in front ksk knit 1 slip 1 with yarn in front knit sks slip 1 with yarn in front k1 slip 1 1 with yarn in front ktm knit to marker srms slip next stitch purlwise remove m1r make 1 right insert left-hand needle marker move slipped stitch back to left from back to front under the bar between the needle stitch just worked and next stitch on left-hand ssk slip 2 stitches knitwise one at a time needle then knit into the front of this loop insert left needle into front of slipped stitches p purl and knit together through back loops p2tog purl two stitches together sm slip marker pb s project box es sts stitches pm place marker su set up row rm remove marker ws wrong side of work this pattern may not be altered reproduced or sold without my permission 2 cast on long tail cast on 7 sts in colour a section 1 pb s su 1 sks pm p1 pm sks 1 rs 2 ksk sm m1r k1 sm ksk 8 sts 2 ws 3 sks sm p2 sm sks 3 4 ksk sm m1r s2b sm ksk 9 sts 4 5 sks sm s2f p1 sm sks 5 6 ksk sm s1b k2 sm ksk 6 7 sks sm p2 s1f sm sks 7 8 ksk sm m1r k1 s2b sm ksk 10 sts 8 9 sks sm s2f p2 sm sks 9 10 ksk sm m1r s2b k2 sm ksk 11 sts 10 11 sks sm p2 s2f p1 sm sks 11 12 ksk sm s1b k2 s2b sm ksk 12 13 sks sm s2f p2 s1f sm sks 13 14 ksk sm m1r k1 s2b k2 sm ksk 12 sts 14 15 sks sm p2 s2f p2 sm sks 15 section 2 pb s 16 ksk sm m1r pm s2b k2 s2b sm ksk 13 sts 16 17 sks sm s2f p2 s2f sm ktm sm sks 17 18 ksk sm m1r ktm sm k2 s2b k2 sm ksk 14 sts 18 19 sks sm p2 s2f p2 sm ktm sm sks 19 20 ksk sm m1r ktm sm s2b k2 s2b sm ksk 15 sts 20 21 sks sm s2f p2 s2f sm ktm sm sks 21 row 22 to 53 repeat row 18 to 21 use the pb s to keep track you will be increasing 1 stitch every rightside row 22 26 30 34 38 42 46 50 23 27 31 35 39 43 47 51 24 28 32 36 40 44 48 52 25 29 33 37 41 45 49 53 pb s 54 ksk sm m1r ktm sm k2 s2b k2 sm ksk
